metaDescription: Exklusiv 4-bedroom villa in prestigious Campoamor, Orihuela Costa. Premium specification at 35% less than Costa Blanca Nord. €1,195,000.
heroIntro: Welcome to an exceptional opportunity in Campoamor, one of Orihuela Costa's most prestigious addresses. This exclusive 4-bedroom villa represents a sophisticated investment for discerning buyers seeking premium Mediterranean living without the inflated prices of Costa Blanca North. Priced at €1,195,000 with a price per square meter of €6,097, this property delivers remarkable value—35% more affordable than comparable properties in northern regions while maintaining the highest standards of specification and finish. Built across 196 square meters of carefully designed living space on a substantial 500-square-meter plot, this villa exemplifies modern Spanish Mediterranean architecture. The property showcases premium construction quality and thoughtful design throughout, featuring four generously proportioned bedrooms and two well-appointed bathrooms. Located in the heart of the Golf Valley, with Villamartín Golf Club practically on your doorstep and four additional championship courses within minutes, this residence caters to the discerning lifestyle of international buyers who demand both exclusivity and accessibility. The strategic positioning of this property places you at the intersection of natural beauty, world-class amenities, and a thriving expatriate community that values privacy, quality, and authentic Mediterranean living.
areaSection: Campoamor stands as one of the Costa Blanca's most refined and established communities, nestled within the broader Orihuela Costa region of southern Alicante. This sought-after enclave is renowned for its championship golf courses—Villamartín, Campoamor, Las Colinas, and Las Ramblas create an extraordinary golfing destination that attracts enthusiasts from across Europe. The area benefits from exceptional Mediterranean climate with over 300 days of sunshine annually, crystalline blue waters, and proximity to pristine beaches including the Blue Flag-designated La Zenia Beach. Beyond the golf courses, Campoamor's geography offers elevated vantage points with views toward the Mediterranean, while maintaining careful architectural preservation that prevents overdevelopment. The community maintains an exclusive yet welcoming character, with established infrastructure, excellent road connectivity, and proximity to both the vibrant beach communities of Cabo Roig and Playa Flamenca. This location represents the pinnacle of Costa Blanca's interior villa communities, where international standards meet Mediterranean authenticity.
lifestyleSection: Daily life in Campoamor revolves around golf, fine dining, and sophisticated leisure. The area supports a well-established expatriate community—predominantly British, Scandinavian, and Dutch residents—where English is widely spoken and international standards are the norm. Residents enjoy access to La Zenia Boulevard, one of Spain's premier shopping destinations with over 140 boutiques, fine dining establishments, and entertainment venues, located just minutes away. Healthcare is comprehensive with Hospital de Torrevieja and Quirónsalud both within 15-20 minutes, plus numerous private clinics with English-speaking medical professionals. The culinary scene is exceptional, with beachfront chiringuitos serving fresh Mediterranean cuisine alongside sophisticated international restaurants catering to cosmopolitan tastes. Weekly markets provide fresh local produce, while international supermarkets stock familiar brands for expatriate families. The social fabric is strong—golf clubs, yacht clubs, beach clubs, and expatriate associations create natural networks for integration and friendship. Beach access is seamless, with La Zenia and Campoamor beaches offering both vibrant summer atmospheres and tranquil off-season authenticity.
investmentSection: This property represents a compelling investment thesis for international capital seeking European real estate exposure. Orihuela Costa appreciates at approximately 10% annually, significantly outpacing broader Spanish real estate markets and European averages. The €6,097 per square meter valuation—35% below comparable Costa Blanca North properties—provides substantial upside potential as infrastructure improvements and international recognition increase. The rental market remains robust, with typical weekly rates of €800 for comparable four-bedroom properties, generating potential annual rental income of €35,000-€40,000 for motivated landlords. The Golf Valley location attracts year-round visitors—golfers during shoulder seasons, holidaymakers during summer months—ensuring consistent demand. Campoamor's established position, international expatriate community, and improving infrastructure create favorable conditions for long-term appreciation. For buyers seeking both personal use and investment returns, this property offers dual-purpose utility rarely found at this price point.
conclusion: This exceptional villa in prestigious Campoamor represents precisely what discerning international buyers seek: premium specification at accessible pricing, established golf and leisure excellence, integrated expatriate community, and proven investment appreciation. The 35% discount versus Costa Blanca North properties of identical standard, combined with Villamartín Golf Club proximity and strong rental potential, creates a compelling dual-purpose opportunity. Whether your priority centers on championship golf, Mediterranean lifestyle, or investment diversification, this property delivers on all fronts. The four-bedroom configuration, substantial private plot, and Campoamor's exclusive positioning ensure both personal enjoyment and future appreciation. Contact us immediately via WhatsApp to arrange a private viewing and discover why this address attracts the Costa Blanca's most sophisticated international residents.

healthcare.text: Healthcare provision in the Orihuela Costa region meets international standards with multiple facilities catering to English-speaking patients. Hospital de Torrevieja, located 15 kilometers away, represents one of Spain's premier private hospitals with comprehensive departments, modern diagnostic equipment, and English-speaking medical staff. Quirónsalud Hospital (20 kilometers) provides additional specialist services and emergency capabilities. Numerous private clinics throughout the area offer general practice, dental, ophthalmology, and specialist services with English-speaking doctors familiar with expatriate healthcare needs. Prescription medications are readily available through pharmacies with English-speaking pharmacists. The healthcare infrastructure demonstrates international standards equivalent to Northern European systems, providing reassurance for families and retirees prioritizing medical access.

shopping.text: La Zenia Boulevard, one of Spain's premier shopping destinations, stands just four kilometers away with over 140 international boutiques, department stores, and restaurants. Mercadona, Consum, and Lidl supermarkets provide daily groceries with international product sections catering to expatriate preferences. Specialty shops—English bookstores, international delis, healthcare retailers—are established throughout the area, ensuring familiar products and standards.

The region's road infrastructure supports straightforward navigation, and numerous car rental and car-sharing services accommodate varied transportation needs. Proximity to the Mediterranean coast enables easy access to ferry services from Alicante to North Africa.

faqs.answer: Orihuela Costa is internationally recognized as the Golf Valley, home to five championship courses including prestigious Villamartín Golf Club.
